job_description: SpaceList is a marketplace for office, retail and industrial space. We host 1/2 billion square feet of available space and generate over 100 inquiries each day.You need to be able to put yourself in our users’ shoes, understand their issues, and design a solution that will knock their socks off. You must draw insight from feedback and get your ideas across clearly & concisely. You are not afraid to roll up your sleeves and do what needs to get done... whether it is a quick bug fix or a writing a complex algorithm. You’re equally comfortable at the top of the stack as you are at the bottom. Whether it’s tweaking CSS layout issues or getting a database model into third normal form. Above all else, you are an excellent communicator and collaborator.
job_requirements: • Working knowledge of AngularJS, Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, and ElasticSearch are a huge plus.• Knowledge of the Unix command line is essential.• Ability to work independently or in a small team.• 4 or 8 month terms available.• SpaceList is a bring your own computer workplace.Open To All Majors:No
